001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.providers;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStoreConfiguration;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStores;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
007import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.spi.SecretsProvider;
008
009import javax.crypto.SecretKeyFactory;
010import javax.crypto.spec.PBEKeySpec;
011import java.io.IOException;
012import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
013import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
014import java.security.KeyStore;
015import java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException;
016
017public class KeyStoreSecretsProvider
018        implements SecretsProvider {
019    private final String keyStoreName;
020    private final KeyStore keyStore;
021    private final SecretKeyFactory factory;
022    private final KeyStore.PasswordProtection keyStorePP;
023
024    public KeyStoreSecretsProvider(Configuration configuration, KeyStores keyStores, Secrets secrets) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, IOException {
025        KeyStoreSecretsProviderConfiguration config = new KeyStoreSecretsProviderConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("secrets.keystore"));
026        keyStoreName = config.getKeyStoreName();
027        this.keyStore = keyStores.getKeyStore(config.getKeyStoreName());
028        factory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("PBE");
029        KeyStoreConfiguration keyStoreConfiguration = new KeyStoreConfiguration(config.getKeyStoreName(), configuration.getConfiguration("keystores." + config.getKeyStoreName()));
030        char[] password = keyStoreConfiguration.getPassword().map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null);
031        keyStorePP = new KeyStore.PasswordProtection(password);
032    }
033
034    @Override
035    public String getSecretString(String name) {
036
037        try {
038            KeyStore.SecretKeyEntry ske = (KeyStore.SecretKeyEntry) keyStore.getEntry(name, keyStorePP);
039            if (ske == null)
040                throw new IllegalArgumentException("No secret with alias '" + name + "' in keystore '" + keyStoreName + "'");
041            PBEKeySpec keySpec = (PBEKeySpec) factory.getKeySpec(ske.getSecretKey(), PBEKeySpec.class);
042            char[] secret = keySpec.getPassword();
043            return new String(secret);
044        } catch (Throwable e) {
045            throw new UncheckedIOException(new IOException(e));
046        }
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public byte[] getSecretBytes(String name) {
051        try {
052            KeyStore.SecretKeyEntry ske = (KeyStore.SecretKeyEntry) keyStore.getEntry(name, keyStorePP);
053            if (ske == null)
054                throw new IllegalArgumentException("No secret with alias '" + name + "' in keystore '" + keyStoreName + "'");
055            PBEKeySpec keySpec = (PBEKeySpec) factory.getKeySpec(ske.getSecretKey(), PBEKeySpec.class);
056            char[] secret = keySpec.getPassword();
057            return new String(secret).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
058        } catch (Throwable e) {
059            throw new UncheckedIOException(new IOException(e));
060        }
061    }
062
063    @Override
064    public void refreshSecret(String name) {
065        // no-op
066    }
067}
